system.description:
Prequisites

Psionics (Any) 2 ranks

Benefit

The character can use any single bladed, curved hilt psiblade or double bladed psiblades without penalty.

Normal

Characters without this feat take a -4 penalty on attack rolls made with single bladed and curved hilt psiblades, and a -8 on double bladed psiblades.

Special

A character with Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Combat Swords or Fencing Swords) only takes a -2 penalty on attack rolls when using a single bladed psiblade.

Tutoring

Time: 3 Days

Benefit: Attack penalty when using single bladed psiblades is reduced to -2. Attack penalty when using double bladed psiblades is reduced to -6. If the character has Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Combat Swords or Fencing Swords) the penalty is reduced to -1 for single bladed psiblades.
